taskbody.context: To copy/cut and paste a column, take the following steps:

step.cmd: Place the cursor in a column that you want to copy/cut.

step.info: Choose Table Columns Copy Column/Cut Column .

step.cmd: Place the cursor in a cell near which you want to paste the column.

choices.choice: To paste the column to the left of the cell, choose Table Columns Paste Column Before .
To paste the column to the right of the cell, choose Table Columns Paste Column After .
